title: How do I set the photo mode?
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123283) in the camera options bar and switch to another photo mode. 

 For EMUI 3.0, select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123284) in the camera options bar and select another photo mode.
keywords: switch, configure, select, take photos, camera, capture, mode
